Package Database.QueryTables

Class AppointmentsTable

java.lang.Object
Database.QueryTables.AppointmentsTable
public class AppointmentsTable extends Object
Class is used to query the appointments table in database.

    • getAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointments()
      This method is used to query the appointments table in database and return each record in an ObservableList.
      Returns:
      returns an ObservableList of Appointments.

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, String start, String end, int customerID, int userID, int contactID)
      This method is used by appointment controller to add an appointment to the database.
      Parameters:
      title - - String title of the appointment
      description - - String description of the appointment
      location - - String location of the appointment
      type - - String type of the appointment
      start - - LocalDateTime start of the appointment
      end - - LocalDateTime end of the appointment
      customerID - - int customerID of the appointment
      userID - - int userID of the appointment
      contactID - - int contactID of the appointment

    • updateAppointment

      public static void updateAppointment(int appointmentID, String title, String description, String location, String type, String start, String end, int customerID, int userID, int contactID)
      This method is used by appointment controller to update an existing appointment in the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - - int appointmentID of the appointment to be updated
      title - - String title of the appointment
      description - - String description of the appointment
      location - - String location of the appointment
      type - - String type of the appointment
      start - - LocalDateTime start of the appointment
      end - - LocalDateTime end of the appointment
      customerID - - int customerID of the appointment
      userID - - int userID of the appointment
      contactID - - int contactID of the appointment

    • deleteAppointment

      public static void deleteAppointment(int appointmentID)
      This method is used by appointment controller to delete an appointment from the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - - int appointmentID of the appointment to be deleted

    • generateReport1

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Report1> generateReport1(String month)
      This method is used by appointment controller to generate Report 1 based on appointments table. It counts the number of existing appointments by month and type.
      Parameters:
      month - - String month to be used in query
      Returns:
      returns an ObservableList of Report1.

    • generateReport2

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Report2> generateReport2(int contactID)
      This method is used by appointment controller to generate Report 2 based on appointments table. It returns an appointment schedule for a given contact
      Parameters:
      contactID - - contact to be used in the query
      Returns:
      returns an ObservableList of Report2.

    • generateReport3

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Report3> generateReport3()
      This method is used by appointment controller to generate Report 3 based on appointments table. It returns the total number of upcoming and past appointments for each customer.
      Returns:
      returns an ObservableList of Report3.
